DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics AZD5213 healthy young elderly Japanese subject
DOC.brief_title: Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics AZD5213 After Single Multiple Ascending Oral Doses Healthy Young Elderly Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedures Japanese healthy male subject age 20 45 year ( young ) male female subject age 65 80 year ( elderly ) Male subject willing use barrier contraception ie , condom , first day dose 3 month last dose investigational product Have body mass index ( BMI ) 17 27 kg/m2 weigh least 45 kg 100 kg Clinically normal physical finding , supine BP , pulse rate , ECG laboratory assessment relation age , judge investigator ( ) History clinically significant disease disorder , opinion investigator , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug History previous ongoing psychiatric disease/condition include psychosis , affective disorder , anxiety disorder , personality disorder include borderline accord criterion Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders History psychotic disorder among first degree relative . History use antipsychotic , antidepressant anxiolytic drug , prescribe well nonprescribed use .
